official.headline: Marek Halden Passes
official.anchor_line: Esteemed systems architect Marek Halden has passed away, leading Stenograd with enduring stability.
official.contextual_reframing: His unwavering commitment to advancing the Behavioral Compliance Index leaves a legacy of precision and progress.

underground.headline: Halden's Mysterious Death
underground.anchor_line: The architect of our surveillance, Marek Halden, found dead under suspicious circumstances.
underground.contextual_reframing: What they won't tell you: His heart stopped, but whispers say it was shutdown too neat to be natural.
